mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT(NICKNAME, CONTENT, SEND_TIME) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{content}, #{sendTime})
mapper.select: SELECT NICKNAME, CONTENT, SEND_TIME FROM CHAT
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT C1 WHERE C1.SEND_TIME = ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C2.SEND_TIME FROM CHAT C2 ORDER BY C2.SEND_TIME LIMIT 1 ) emp )
